title: Stage Lv6-D4-S10
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Investment returns exceeded the benchmark. (professional variant 1)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Portfolio diversification reduces risk. (professional variant 1)
Investment returns exceeded the benchmark. (professional variant 1)
Asset allocation strategy has been established. (professional variant 1)
Volatility is within the expected range. (professional variant 1)
The Sharpe ratio indicates excellent performance. (professional variant 1)
The beta coefficient shows market sensitivity. (professional variant 1)
Value at Risk has been calculated. (professional variant 1)
Liquidity risk must be considered. (professional variant 1)
The hedging strategy was effective. (professional variant 1)
Arbitrage opportunities have been identified. (professional variant 1)
